description: Agent test definitions for automated testing

tests.name: Basic Feature Research
tests.prompt: Research how the command system works in EllyMUD. Focus on how commands are registered and executed. Save output to .github/agents/research/

tests.name: Bug Investigation
tests.prompt: Research the combat system in EllyMUD. Find how damage is calculated and identify the key files involved.

tests.name: Simple Command Plan
tests.prompt: Create an implementation plan for adding a 'wave' social command. Commands are in src/command/commands/ and extend BaseCommand. Include file paths and code snippets.

tests.name: Multi-file Plan
tests.prompt: Create an implementation plan for adding player titles that display before names. This needs changes to user storage and display logic.

tests.name: File Creation
tests.prompt: Following the plan: Create src/command/commands/test-wave.ts implementing a 'wave' command that outputs 'You wave!' when executed. Use BaseCommand pattern.

tests.name: Build Verification
tests.prompt: After creating the wave command file, run npm run build to verify it compiles correctly. Document the result.

tests.name: Implementation Validation
tests.prompt: Validate the wave command implementation. Check: 1) File exists at src/command/commands/test-wave.ts, 2) Build passes, 3) Code follows BaseCommand pattern. Provide PASS/FAIL verdict.

tests.name: Regression Check
tests.prompt: Validate that existing commands still work after changes. Run build and check for errors in the command system.
